rooms.description: Vastu-compliant entrance designed to welcome positive energy. Positioned on the northern side for auspicious entry. Incorporates modern Brutalist elements with raw concrete finishes.
Spacious living area with open-plan design. Features large windows on the east and south for natural light, aligned to promote energy flow.
Formal dining space with a view of the swimming pool. Designed to enhance social gatherings while adhering to Vastu principles.
Modern kitchen with state-of-the-art appliances. Positioned on the north-western side for auspicious placement as per Vastu norms.
Luxury master bedroom with a private balcony. Located on the east side to invite morning sunlight and energy.
Spacious bathroom designed with ample natural light. Positioned adjacent to the master bedroom for privacy and convenience.
Dedicated home office space with ergonomic design. Placed in a quiet corner on the north-east to encourage productivity and positive energy flow.
Guest bedroom with en-suite bathroom. Situated on the west to balance energies.
Compact and modern bathroom for guest use.
Efficient living space for staff, designed with functional interiors and located on the south-west corner as per Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: Large, fixed windows for maximum natural light.
Direct access to outdoor swimming pool area.

rooms.description: Luxury upper-floor master bedroom offering panoramic views, with a balcony for relaxation. Vastu compliant by being positioned on the east.
Comfortable guest bedroom designed to ensure privacy and serenity. Positioned on the west for balanced energy flow.
Additional workspace with ample lighting from north-east windows, ensuring productivity.
Shared upper floor balcony offering views of the entire property. Designed with minimalist Brutalist elements.

openings.description: Large windows designed to enhance natural light.
